${ModID}:FrostbitePower.NAME: Frostbite
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever this enemy attacks, it suffers !A! damage.

DESCRIPTIONS: The next #yResonant card you play costs 0.
The next !A! #yResonant cards you play cost 0.

${ModID}:SummonMonsterPower.NAME: Pandamonium
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Channel a Panda that deals !A! damage.

DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal Attack damage, gain !A! #yTemporary #yHP.

${ModID}:EnergizedExilePower.NAME: Energized
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b !A! additional [E] next turn.

${ModID}:RingingPower.NAME: Ringing
DESCRIPTIONS: Loses !A! HP at the start of its turn.

${ModID}:TempNegStrengthPower.NAME: Damage Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Does !A! less damage with attacks this turn.

${ModID}:BarbedPower.NAME: Barbed
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! damage when attacked.

${ModID}:ConvertPower.NAME: ConvertPower
DESCRIPTIONS: The next non-power non-exhausting Exile card you play becomes #yResonant.
The next !A! non-power non-exhausting Exile cards you play become #yResonant.

${ModID}:SharpNoisePower.NAME: Sharp Noise
DESCRIPTIONS: Resonant cards deal !A! additional damage per Resonance.

${ModID}:AcousticsPower.NAME: Acoustics
DESCRIPTIONS: Resonant cards target ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ElegantEtchingPower.NAME: Elegant Etching
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySigils are played !A2! times and exhaust.

${ModID}:HarmonyPower.NAME: Harmony
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn gain #yBlock equal to your #yResonance amount times !A!.

DESCRIPTIONS: Activate to draw a card and discard a card. !A! use left.
Activate to draw a card and discard a card. !A! uses left.

${ModID}:TargetedPower.NAME: Targeted
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes 50% more damage from Attacks when #yWeakened.

${ModID}:JinxPower.NAME: Jinx
DESCRIPTIONS: When debuffed with another debuff, this creature will lose !A! HP.

${ModID}:NoceboPower.NAME: Nocebo
DESCRIPTIONS: This doesn't do anything.

DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, you may spend [E] to draw !A2! cards.
!A! times per turn, you may spend [E] to draw !A2! cards.
Spend [E] to draw !A2! cards.

You may spend [E] to Channel a !A! damage #ySwarm #yof #yBees.

DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a non-minion enemy dies, gain !A! Max HP.

${ModID}:StoneskinPower.NAME: Stoneskin
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would take damage this turn, take !A! less.

${ModID}:FlankedPower.NAME: Flanked
DESCRIPTIONS: Loses !A! HP when attacked.

${ModID}:DecayPower.NAME: Decay
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! extra damage from non-Attacks.

DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play an attack each turn, draw a card.
The first !A! times you play an attack each turn, draw a card.

${ModID}:SpinningSigilPower.NAME: Spinning
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yJinx, apply !A! more.

The first !A! times you discard a #ySigil each turn, gain [E].

${ModID}:ExileStudyPower.NAME: Study

DESCRIPTIONS: [${ModID}:PhantasmalIcon] Attacks gain twice as much bonus damage from being charged.
[${ModID}:PhantasmalIcon] Attacks gain !A! times more bonus damage from being charged.

${ModID}:ElementalProwessIce.NAME: Cold Boost
DESCRIPTIONS: [${ModID}:IceIcon] Attacks apply twice as much #yFrostbite.
[${ModID}:IceIcon] Attacks apply !A! times more #yFrostbite.

[${ModID}:EldritchIcon] Attacks spells grant !A! times more #yTemporary #yHP.

${ModID}:ElementalProwessLightning.NAME: Lightning Boost

[${ModID}:LightningIcon] Attacks gain !A! times more bonus damage from attacking a Vulnerable enemy.

${ModID}:JinxOnHitPower.NAME: Shadow Whipped

DESCRIPTIONS: Frostbite is not reduced this turn.
Frostbite is not reduced for !A! turns.

Whenever you would discard a status, exhaust it and draw !A! cards.

${ModID}:SadisticGleePower.NAME: Sadistic Glee
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain !A! #yBlock whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy.

DESCRIPTIONS: Your next attack deals !A!% more damage.
